scripts.build:prod: pnpm run bild_demo_app1 && pnpm run bild_sportA && pnpm run bild_main_app && pnpm run bild_demo_app2
scripts.bild_demo_app1: cd childrenApps && cd demo_app1 && npm run build:prod
scripts.bild_demo_app2: cd childrenApps && cd demo_app2 && npm run build:prod
scripts.bild_sportA: cd childrenApps && cd sportA && npm run build:prod
